name: 楊元森
objective: 這是大學部學生的第二門程式語言課程，將銜接基礎的Fortran程式設計，並準備學生進入FIT-2。 本課程將以C/C++教授物件、類別、控制敘述、函數、陣列、向量、指標、字串、資料抽象化、控制元超載、繼承、及變形等課題。（學校規定之專業必修課程）
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Programming 
Week 2: Typing Exercise and Evaluation (http://www.typingtest.com/) 
Week 3: Data Input / Calculation Output 
Week 4: Variables and Functions
Week 5: Take-home Assignment Explanation
Week 6: Branching Statements 
Week 7: Array / Vector / Matrix Operations
Week 8: Midterm simulation
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Programming on mathematical formula (I)
Week 11: Programming on mathematical formula (II)
Week 12: Programming on Branching and Loop (I)
Week 13: Programming on Branching and Loop (II)
Week 14: Programming on Branching and Loop (III)
Week 15: Programming on Functions 
Week 16: Overall Review
Week 17: Take-home Assignment Explanation
Week 18: Final exam.
scorePolicy:
Assignment, interaction in class, note taken: 30% +/- 10%
Midterm: 30% +/- 10%
Final: 40% +/- 10%
materials: Lecturer's note and selected online material
